statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerSubscriptions ORDER BY SubscriptionId DESC;
SELECT PlayerId FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE SubscriptionId = 100;
SELECT * FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE SubscriptionId IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY PlayerId ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalSubscriptions FROM PlayerSubscriptions;
SELECT PlayerId, SubscriptionType FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE EndDate > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE player_id = 12345 AND subscription_status = 'active' ORDER BY subscription_end_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, subscription_status FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'premium' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS subscription_count, MAX(subscription_end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM PlayerSubscriptions GROUP BY player_id HAVING subscription_count > 2;
SELECT player_id, SUM(subscription_amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE subscription_status = 'paid' GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_amount_paid DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, subscription_type FROM PlayerSubscriptions WHERE subscription_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_subscriptions;
SELECT player_id, subscription_type FROM player_subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, subscription_type, end_date FROM player_subscriptions ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT membership_id, player_id, membership_level FROM membership_details WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM membership_details WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM player_subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, subscription_type FROM player_subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, subscription_type, start_date FROM player_subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY subscription_type ASC;

SELECT player_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM player_subscriptions JOIN membership_details ON player_subscriptions.player_id = membership_details.player_id WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, start_date, end_date FROM player_subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Basic' ORDER BY player_id ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM Player;
SELECT * FROM Subscription WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT player_id, level, expiry_date FROM Membership;
SELECT player_id, username, email, total_games_played FROM Player ORDER BY total_games_played DESC;
SELECT player_id, email, total_games_played FROM Player WHERE total_games_played > 100;
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, registration_date FROM Player WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.player_id, p.username, m.level FROM Player p JOIN Membership m ON p.player_id = m.player_id WHERE m.premium_content_access = true;
SELECT p.player_id, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.status FROM Player p LEFT JOIN Subscription s ON p.player_id = s.player_id WHERE s.status = 'Active' ORDER BY s.end_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players;
SELECT player_name, subscription_status FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, email, subscription_status FROM players WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT player_name, email, subscription_status FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM premium_content WHERE is_premium = true ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players WHERE subscription_status = true
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE plan_name = 'Gold' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT player_name, payment_date, amount FROM players JOIN payment_history ON players.player_id = payment_history.player_id
SELECT player_name, start_date, end_date FROM players JOIN subscriptions ON players.player_id = subscriptions.player_id WHERE plan_name = 'Silver'
SELECT content_id, content_name, description FROM premium_content WHERE is_premium = true
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT subscription_type, subscription_start_date, subscription_end_date FROM subscription WHERE subscription_end_date < NOW();
SELECT player_name, payment_date, amount FROM player p JOIN payment pm ON p.player_id = pm.player_id;
SELECT player_name, membership_level FROM player p JOIN membership m ON p.player_id = m.player_id WHERE membership_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscription ORDER BY subscription_end_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, payment_date, amount FROM player JOIN payment ON player.player_id = payment.player_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT player_name, membership_level, membership_end_date FROM player JOIN membership ON player.player_id = membership.player_id WHERE membership_level = 'Premium';
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players, AVG(amount) AS average_payment FROM payment GROUP BY player_id;
